metadata.title: CVE-2017-16229 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In the Ox gem 2.8.1 for Ruby, the process crashes with a stack-based buffer over-read in the read_from_str function in sax_buf.c when a crafted input is supplied to sax_parse.

criterions.comment: ruby-ox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.2-1build2').
